title: Science Learning Data Augmentation Strategies Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Students solve science-related problems using personal devices, with sparse data collected by an Intelligent Tutoring System (ITS) supplemented by Knowledge Tracing (KT) technology. Project-based assessments synthesize learning outcomes comprehensively

learning_goals: Students can visualize and interpret patterns in learning data through 3D tensor modeling.
Missing learning data can be accurately supplemented by over 85% using knowledge tracing (KT)-based tensor decomposition techniques.
Synthetic data tailored to individual learning types can be generated and evaluated by applying generative AI based on GAN/GPT-4o.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
